name: 3D Format
summary: Learn about .3DF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MYRIAD 3D Reader has been discontinued and is no longer available for download.

description: Highly compressed, secure three-dimensional image format that is a replica of the original model file; permits assembly part viewing, cut away, cross section, and measurements; includes security options that can limit printing and copying; may also be password protected.
